name: Animals Matching Blocks for Kids Pro
name_original: Animals Matching Blocks for Kids Pro
description:
We have introduced Unlimited levels and smooth gameplay for Non-stop fun.

Beautifully designed Match game for Kids with great learning experience which will not only sharpen the memory but will also make them learn more about different animals and sounds.

Game Features:

- Universal Game (works on all iOS devices).
- Child-friendly interface.
- Four different themes to play with : Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Sea Creatures, Insects.
- 32 different Animals to play and new words to learn through sounds.
- Make high scores and share it on Facebook and Twitter
- Gamecenter Integration allows you to check the highest scores in all 4 themes.
- Beautifully designed levels with lovely backgrounds and animals.
- Clear and pleasant sounds.

Share your feedback with us. It will help us make better games/apps for Kids.
